list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a point, period, or step in a process or development.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there is no need at this stage to give explicit details
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Không cần ở giai đoạn này để cung cấp chi tiết rõ ràng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a raised floor or platform, typically in a theater, on which actors, entertainers, or speakers perform.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: there are only two characters on stage
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chỉ có hai nhân vật trên sân khấu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a floor or level of a building or structure.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the upper stage was added in the 17th century
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: giai đoạn trên đã được thêm vào vào thế kỷ 17

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in chronostratigraphy) a range of strata corresponding to an age in time, forming a subdivision of a series.
present a performance of (a play or other show).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the show is being staged at the Goodspeed Opera House
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chương trình đang được tổ chức tại nhà hát opera hàng hóa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: diagnose or classify (a disease or patient) as having reached a particular stage in the expected progression of the disease.
